details: A remedy for cancer, polyarthritis. Proved in potencies by Dr. B.C. Woodbury.REDNESS of palms.BURNING under finger nails and toe nails, on soles.Burning in various parts on skin.Shifting location after scratching which relieves.Redness, burning and NUMBNESS of tongue.ITCHING and redness of knee-caps.Peculiar sensation of being very tall with tendency to vertigo.
name: Eosin
